name: FRigUnit_FitChainToSplineCurve
doc:
Fits a given chain to a spline curve.
Additionally provides rotational control matching the features of the Distribute Rotation node.

Alignment: Specifies how to align the chain on the curve
Minimum: The minimum U value to use on the curve
Maximum: The maximum U value to use on the curve
SamplingPrecision: The number of samples to use on the curve. Clamped at 64.
PrimaryAxis: The major axis being aligned - along the bone
SecondaryAxis:
The minor axis being aligned - towards the pole vector.
You can use (0.0, 0.0, 0.0) to disable it.
PoleVectorPosition:
The the position of the pole vector used for aligning the secondary axis.
Only has an effect if the secondary axis is set.
Rotations: The list of rotations to be applied along the curve
RotationEaseType: The easing to use between to rotations.
Weight: The weight of the solver - how much the rotation should be applied
bPropagateToChildren:
If set to true all of the global transforms of the children
of this bone will be recalculated based on their local transforms.
Note: This is computationally more expensive than turning it off.
ExecuteContext: * This property is used to chain multiple mutable units together
